main event: An unidentified object was observed near Frenchman's Bayou, Arkansas, believed to be an aircraft, moving erratically for 15 minutes on December 17, 1954.
interesting points: The object's movement was zigzagging and irregular without producing a contrail or sound., The sighting was recorded both visually and on ground radar., The observation lasted from 1530 to 1545 CST., Spontaneous combustion was found in the area, indicating a possible disturbance caused by the object., A military investigation was initiated following the sighting.
witness description: A civilian observation reported by Mr. ***********
